title: Ep 95: Physical Chemistry with Cosmetic Chemist Dr. Geoffrey Genesky (Jess's Husband!)
itunes:title: Ep 95: Physical Chemistry with Cosmetic Chemist Dr. Geoffrey Genesky (Jess's Husband!)
itunes:subtitle: A Valentine’s Day Special! Dr. Geoffrey Genesky, scientific director for Kiehl’s—and Jess’s fiancé—talks about skincare formulation, the truth about silicone, and how the beauty industry’s hottest romance got its start. Also in this episode: the myth o...
description:
A Valentine’s Day Special! Dr. Geoffrey Genesky, scientific director for Kiehl’s—and Jess’s fiancé—talks about skincare formulation, the truth about silicone, and how the beauty industry’s hottest romance got its start. Also in this episode: the myth of perfect skin, hypoallergenic hype, and makeup tips for daytime drama.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
